overview:
Mario De’Cristofano is a serial Internet Entrepreneur, dot.com startup founder of easysystemsuk, easysystemsuk and the EasyGroup range of technology companies. He is also an angel investor for a range of technology start ups.

Currentley working on a range of projects including blogs, webTV and technology websites.

Mario currentley works for TicketMaster Entertainment in London, as a senior manager for the Core Infrastructure team. Previousy, Mario has worked in telecommunications, architecture, software testing and development, law and music and production.
